item.title: 中国计划在全国范围内发放补贴以促进出生率和经济增长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正计划向家庭发放现金，以鼓励夫妇生育子女，因为多年的人口下降威胁着这个世界第二大经济体。【原文：China is planning to offer cash handouts to families as an incentive for couples to have children, according to people familiar with the matter, as years of population decline threatens the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 印度企业对卢比债券的狂热在创下历史纪录后有望放缓
item.description: 在印度央行暗示进一步降息的空间可能有限之后，印度繁忙的本币卢比债券市场准备放缓。【原文：India’s busy local-currency rupee bond market is poised to slow after the country’s central bank hinted room for further rate cuts could be limited.】

item.title: 印度限制简街进入其证券市场
item.description: 印度监管机构已限制简街集团进入当地证券市场，这对去年从南亚国家股票衍生品中获得超过 23 亿美元净收入的美国对冲基金造成了沉重打击。【原文：India’s regulator has restrained Jane Street Group from accessing the local securities market, dealing a severe hit to the US hedge fund that generated more than $2.3 billion in net revenue from equity derivatives in the South Asian nation last year.】

item.title: 投资者权衡利率和贸易影响，黄金将实现周线上涨
item.description: 尽管周四黄金下跌，但仍有望实现周线上涨，原因是投资者权衡了美联储降息可能性降低以及对全球贸易前景的持续担忧。【原文：Gold remained on track for a weekly gain despite falling on Thursday, as investors weighed lower odds for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts as well as lingering concerns about the outlook for global trade.】

item.title: 贸易协议给越南留下了问题和巨大挑战
item.description: 本周的美越贸易协定还远未尘埃落定，但有一点是明确的：在这个已成为亚洲最具活力经济体之一的国家开展业务的公司已经接到通知，要向价值链上游移动。【原文：With the dust far from having settled on this week’s US-Vietnam trade agreement, one thing is clear: companies operating in what’s become one of the most vibrant Asian economies are on notice to move up the value chain.】

item.title: 日本家庭支出增幅创 2022 年夏季以来之最
item.description: 在持续通胀的背景下，日本家庭支出创下自 2022 年夏季以来的最大增幅，为因美国关税而受到冲击的经济提供了支撑。【原文：Japan’s household spending rose the most since the summer of 2022 amid persistent inflation, providing support for an economy that’s taking a hit from US tariffs.】

item.title: 亚洲基金借势流行市场反弹，转投三星赌注
item.description: 在三星电子股价飙升之前，一家与同业竞争的亚洲股票基金加入了波普国际集团有限公司（Pop Mart International Group Ltd.），之后又将目光转向了三星电子。【原文：A peer-beating Asian equity fund is turning its sights on Samsung Electronics Co. after adding Pop Mart International Group Ltd. before the latter’s share price surge.】

item.title: 贷款截止日期临近，新世界的融资问题再次成为关注焦点
item.description: 本月，香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developer New World Development Co. is returning to the spotlight this month as investors’ focus turns to its plan to raise as much as $2 billion through a new loan, just days after closing a record refinancing deal.】

item.title: 报道美国将与伊朗重启谈判后，石油保持跌势
item.description: 周四，Axios报道称美国计划重启与伊朗的核谈判，导致石油价格下滑。【原文：Oil was little changed after slipping on Thursday on an Axios report that the US plans to restart nuclear talks with Iran.】

item.title: 美国就业支撑情绪，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 由于强劲的就业数据缓解了人们对经济放缓的担忧，继美股创下新高后，亚洲股市周五将继续攀升。【原文：Asian equities were set to climb Friday following fresh highs for US stocks as strong jobs data eased concerns the economy slowing down.】

item.title: 香港一周内第三次干预维护外汇挂钩机制
item.description: 香港事实上的中央银行再次买入美元，以捍卫其外汇挂钩，因为前两轮干预未能使融资成本高到足以抑制看跌货币的押注。【原文：Hong Kong’s de-facto central bank bought the city’s dollar again to defend its foreign-exchange peg, as two previous rounds of intervention failed to send funding costs high enough to dampen bearish currency bets.】

item.title: 秘鲁铜矿受阻凸显非正规矿工影响力上升
item.description: 本周在秘鲁发生的铜矿运输中断事件凸显了非正规采矿对在这个安第斯国家运营的全球矿业公司造成的日益严重的影响。【原文：Copper transport disruptions this week in Peru underscore the growing impact of informal mining on global mining corporations that operate in the Andean nation.】

item.title: 希腊痛苦的十年复兴让信徒得到回报
item.description:
2015年夏天，该国站在经济悬崖边上。现在，尽管伤痕累累，但它的财政状况却令欧洲羡慕不已— 

。【原文：

In the summer of 2015, the country stood on the economic precipice. Now, its finances are the envy of Europe — despite the scars. 

】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省石油产量降至两年来最低水平
item.description: 由于野火和维护工作压低了油砂的产量，阿尔伯塔省 5 月份的石油产量降至两年来的最低点。【原文：Alberta’s oil production fell to the lowest in two years in May as wildfires and maintenance work crimped oil sands output.】

item.title: 最高法院批准特朗普向南苏丹运送移民
item.description: 美国最高法院表示，特朗普政府可以自由地将八名移民送往南苏丹，驳回了一名法官对高等法院最近一项判决的解释。【原文：The US Supreme Court said the Trump administration is free to send eight migrants to South Sudan, rejecting a judge’s interpretation of a recent high court decision.】

item.title: 超级智能 "是硅谷最喜欢的人工智能新流行语
item.description: 在硅谷，一个新的人工智能流行语正在加速流行。【原文：A new AI buzzword is picking up speed in Silicon Valley.】

item.title: Meta 为新的人工智能超级智能实验室增聘初创公司创始人格罗斯
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Safe Superintelligence Inc. 的前首席执行官兼联合创始人丹尼尔-格罗斯（Daniel Gross）正在加入 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Daniel Gross, the former chief executive officer and co-founder of artificial intelligence startup Safe Superintelligence Inc., is joining Meta Platforms Inc.’s new superintelligence lab focused on AI.】

item.title: 哈佛大学提醒外国留学生注意美国机场和社交媒体
item.description: 哈佛大学的工作人员建议留学生谨慎对待社交媒体上的帖子，并警告一些团体不要抵达波士顿洛根国际机场。【原文：Harvard University staff advised international students to be cautious about social media posts and warned some groups against arriving at Boston’s Logan International Airport.】

item.title: 夫妻团队大胆进军炼油业，却以失败告终
item.description: 早在 2020 年，当法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）为英格兰林赛炼油厂（Lindsey oil refinery）苦苦寻找买家时，一个不太可能的竞标者出手相救：一对没有炼油经验的夫妻团队。本周，他们在炼油行业的尝试以灾难性的失败告终。【原文：When the French oil major TotalEnergies SE was struggling to find a buyer for the Lindsey oil refinery in England back in 2020, an unlikely bidder rode to the rescue: a husband-and-wife team with no track record in refining. Their foray into the industry ended in catastrophic failure this week.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行敦促公司 "大胆 "进行并购股票交易
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）称，今年投资者对出售股票为收购提供资金的加拿大公司给予了奖励，并敦促公司承担更多风险，寻求交易。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce says investors this year have rewarded Canadian companies that have sold shares to fund acquisitions, and it’s urging firms to take more risks and pursue deals.】

item.title: Xbox 高管被一款即将推出的游戏惊呆了。然后他们取消了这款游戏。
item.description:
今年早些时候，ZeniMax 在线工作室的新游戏《黑鸟》给 Xbox 老板菲尔-斯宾塞留下了深刻印象

。【原文：

Blackbird, a new game from ZeniMax Online Studios, impressed Xbox boss Phil Spencer earlier this year

】

item.title: 通胀数据刺激需求，加纳国内债券收益率下降
item.description: 加纳国内债券收益率周四延续跌势，此前这个西非国家报告称通胀率降至三年多来最低。【原文：Ghana’s domestic bond yields extended declines on Thursday after the West African nation reported inflation dropped to the lowest in more than three years.】

item.title: 埃利奥特支持的 Cubic 在增加新股权的交易中重整债务
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）和Veritas资本基金管理公司（Veritas Capital Fund Management）支持的Cubic公司已与债权人达成协议，削减其债务负担并延长到期日，私募股权赞助商还将向这家陷入困境的公司注入新的股权。【原文：Elliott Investment Management and Veritas Capital Fund Management-backed Cubic Corp. has reached an agreement with creditors to cut its debt load and extend maturities in a deal that will also see the private equity sponsors inject fresh equity into the struggling company.】

item.title: 众议院通过税收法案，特朗普赢得广泛的经济政策转变
item.description: 随着众议院通过一项 3.4 万亿美元的财政方案，唐纳德-特朗普总统确保了美国国内政策的彻底转变，该方案削减了税收、减少了安全网项目的开支，并推翻了乔-拜登（Joe Biden）为推动美国迈向清洁能源经济所做的大部分努力。【原文：President Donald Trump secured a sweeping shift in US domestic policy as the House passed a $3.4 trillion fiscal package that cuts taxes, curtails spending on safety-net programs and reversed much of Joe Biden’s efforts to move the country toward a clean-energy economy.】

item.title: 贝森特驳斥美元下跌削弱其全球作用的担忧
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）驳斥了美元最近的下跌会引发人们对其世界主要货币地位的担忧这一观点。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent dismissed the idea that the dollar’s recent declines raise concerns about its status as the world’s key currency.】

item.title: 量化对冲基金乘着市场的 "快车 "在上半年赚得盆满钵满
item.description: 从国债市场逆转到贸易威胁，2025 年上半年主要是政策动荡和华尔街的焦虑。美元大跌，大宗商品和风险资产受到冲击。但是，在全球最大的金融家们运作的市场中，却发生了一件有趣的事情：历史悠久的交易模式占了上风。【原文：From Treasury market reversals to trade threats, the first half of 2025 was dominated by policy upheaval and Wall Street angst. The dollar famously fell, while commodities and risky assets were whipsawed. But inside the markets where the world’s biggest quants operate, a funny thing happened: Time-honored trading patterns prevailed.】

item.title: 菲尔博士的媒体公司在申请破产时解雇了大部分员工并停止生产
item.description: 由著名心理学家菲尔-麦格劳（Phil McGraw）创办的电视初创公司 Merit Street Media 在申请破产的当天裁掉了除六名员工以外的所有员工，称在被其广播合作伙伴逼迫停业后无法制作任何新内容。【原文：Merit Street Media, the television startup founded by celebrity psychologist Phil McGraw, laid off all but six of its employees the day it filed bankruptcy, saying it can’t make any new content after being forced out of business by its broadcasting partner.】

item.title: 俄罗斯亿万富翁就陷入困境的合作关系与风险投资公司对簿公堂
item.description: 15 年前，当俄罗斯亿万富翁德米特里-雷波洛夫列夫（Dmitry Rybolovlev）遇到赛斯-哈里森（Seth Harrison）时，他正希望将自己的部分财富投资于生命科学领域，而这位经验丰富的美国风险投资家似乎是最合适的合作伙伴。【原文：When Russian billionaire Dmitry Rybolovlev met Seth Harrison 15 years ago, he was looking to invest some of his fortune in the life sciences sector, and the seasoned American venture capitalist seemed like the right partner.】

item.title: 顶级咖啡贸易商认为明年巴西咖啡产量将反弹
item.description: 据全球最大的咖啡贸易商称，巴西明年的咖啡产量有望回升，这预示着全球供应紧张的局面将得到缓解。【原文：Brazil is on path for a rebound in coffee production next year, signaling a relief from tight global supplies, according to the world’s largest coffee trader.】

item.title: HPS 的 Puri 说，不良债务转换大多是代价高昂的失败案例
item.description: 据 HPS Investment Partners 称，陷入困境的公司通过债务转换将损失强加给投资者，从而无法维持下去，这证明此类交易行不通。【原文：Troubled companies are failing to stay afloat by forcing losses on investors through debt swaps, proving such deals don’t work, according to HPS Investment Partners.】
